title: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue Plaid, early 20th century
title_raw: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue Plaid
medium: brush and tones of blue watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper
signed: On verso (below inscription),lower right: Weiner Werkstatte stamp in purple [partly legible, see Notes]
inscribed: On verso, inscribed in graphite, lower right: KW 1171 / M1.50; lower left: 1166 [above] 1633(3) [with horizontal line between them]
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper: basket weave or plaid pattern  in tones of blue  (grid formed of darker blue; interior box spaces are lighter blue tone].  Image made by "combed" technique akin to finger painting.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue Plaid, early 20th century. brush and tones of blue watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-11.
